post:
Since it's cyber monday, [SSDNodes](https://www.ssdnodes.com/manage/aff.php?aff=PENIS) has come back with another awesome offer.

KVM / X-LARGE - $ 9.99 /mo WHEN BILLED YEARLY AT $119.99 16GB RAM 80GB SSD 8TB transfer 4-core processor

KVM / LARGE - 7.49 /mo WHEN BILLED YEARLY AT $89.99 8GB RAM 40GB SSD 4TB transfer 2-core processor

KVM / MINI - $ 2.99 /mo WHEN BILLED YEARLY AT $35.99 2GB RAM 10GB SSD 1TB transfer 1-core processor

KVM / 2X-LARGE - $ 19.99 /mo WHEN BILLED YEARLY AT $239.99 32GB RAM 160GB SSD 8TB transfer 4-core processor

Each node has 1TB of DDR4 ECC RAM, 10Gbps NICs, and 8x 1.92TB enterprise-grade SSDs in fast-and-redundant RAID 10 configurations on Dual Xeons (E5-2697v3), and are wide open with 10Gbps ingress/egress.

Unix bench tests I did against the KVM / LARGE instance: https://serverscope.io/trials/96GV - score: 4095.2

Sign up: https://www.ssdnodes.com/manage/aff.php?aff=PENIS

The prices on these offers will only be available for the next ~24 hours.

Don't wanna use an affiliate link...here you go: https://www.ssdnodes.com/

Cheers.
